fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.frontend

Interface DHTServicesCI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, DHTServicesI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, java.rmi.Remote, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI

    public interface DHTServicesCI
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, DHTServicesI
    The component interface DHTServicesCI defines the services that the DHT front end offers.

    Description

    The signatures for get, put and remove correspond to the usual operations on a hash table, while the one for mapReduce is used to perform map/reduce computations.

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2024-06-27

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ContentDataI get(ContentKeyI key)
      get the element associated with key returning null if it is absent from the DHT.
      <R extends java.io.Serializable,A extends java.io.Serializable>
      A      		 mapReduce(SelectorI selector, ProcessorI<R> processor, ReductorI<A,R> reductor, CombinatorI<A> combinator, A initialAcc)
      map the processor computation over the entries in the DHT that passes the selector test and then reduce the results of the map with reductor to compute a new accumulator value from a previous accumulator value and a result from the map, using combinator when there is a need to compute a new accumulator value from two previously computed accumulator values.
      ContentDataI put(ContentKeyI key, ContentDataI value)
      put value associated with key in the DHT and return the previous value associated with key or null if it was not present in the DHT before.
      ContentDataI remove(ContentKeyI key)
      remove the value associated with key from the DHT.

      • mapReduce

        <R extends java.io.Serializable,A extends java.io.Serializable> A mapReduce(SelectorI selector,
                                                                            ProcessorI<R> processor,
                                                                            ReductorI<A,R> reductor,
                                                                            CombinatorI<A> combinator,
                                                                            A initialAcc)
                                                                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: DHTServicesI
        map the processor computation over the entries in the DHT that passes the selector test and then reduce the results of the map with reductor to compute a new accumulator value from a previous accumulator value and a result from the map, using combinator when there is a need to compute a new accumulator value from two previously computed accumulator values.

        Contract

         pre     selector != null
 pre     processor != null
 pre     reductor != null
 pre     combinator != null
 pre     initialAcc != null
 post    true        // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        mapReduce in interface DHTServicesI
        Type Parameters:
        R - type of the results of the map computation.
        A - type of the accumulator in the reduce computation.
        Parameters:
        selector - a boolean function that selects the entries in the DHT that will be processed by the map.
        processor - a function implementing the processing to be mapped itself.
        reductor - function A x R -> A accumulating one map result.
        combinator - function A x A -> A combining two accumulators.
        initialAcc - the initial accumulator value.
        Returns:
        the final accumulator after all reductions.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        DHTServicesI.mapReduce(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.SelectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.ProcessorI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.ReductorI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.dht_mapreduce.interfaces.mapreduce.CombinatorI, java.io.Serializable)
